comment.author: 19909418@N05
comment._content:
Dat lijken kersen- of aardbeienmandjes te zijn.  Interessant!

How interesting... those look like baskets for cherries or strawberries!

comment.author: 31926304@N06
comment._content: Now I'm curious why that's interesting Tina...

comment.author: 19909418@N05
comment._content: If you're asking me why I find this interesting, Malini Fay, it's because normally we (I) don't think of an industry involving shaved strips of wood...  I realize that they are used for all sorts of baskets, such as for Easter eggs.  What I recognize in this photo, however, and which comes to mind vividly -- and it wouldn't have without this picture -- is holding a basket filled with fruit in my hand: the actual feel of carrying it.  I don't know if people in other countries remember buying strawberries and cherries by the basket :-)
